events.name: The Official Google Developer Group for Machine Learning
events.description:
#NCLML <- The Twitter hashtag for our goal to make Newcastle the Home of Machine Learning in the UK

Organized by TusPark Newcastle
Sponsored by Google

This is the official Google Cloud Developer Group, to nurture and educate the local community on topics related to Machine Learning. Our goal is to create a friendly community of experts and like-minded people.

WHAT'S HAPPENING:

• Show and knowledge share, getting feedback from experts.
• Build, Learn, and Launch!
• Be funded / Be hired / Find talent to employ

ALL ARE WELCOME, ESPECIALLY:

• Developers or students who want to learn more about ML
• Potential entrepreneurs
• Companies or organizations who would like to use ML in their business
• Careers: potential employers or job-seekers... or if you want INTERNSHIPS

PROGRAMME:

5.15 pm Coffee and Networking
6 pm Start and Introduction (Colin - TusPark, Yu Guan - Open Lab)
6.15 pm Welcome by Google (Rupert - Google)
6.25 pm Welcome by LKQ and ML Hackathon in Feb (Alan - LKQ)
6.35 pm Welcome by Yitu (Peter - Yitu)
6.45 pm Local Support: Funding and Knowledge (Rick - Northstar VC)
6.55 pm How Barclays is Supporting AI (Alex - Barclays Eagle Labs)
7.05 pm The Tier 1 Exceptional Talent Visa (Jamie - Technation)
7.10 pm Education: An Intro to Machine Learning + Homework (Part 1)
7.55 pm Closing Words
8 pm End

Key Partners and Sponsors:

Google, TusPark, OpenLab, LKQ, KX, Yitu, Barclays

Centre for Data, Northstar, ADV)

8 pm End

Key Partners and Sponsors:

Google, TusPark, Open Lab, LKQ, KX, Yitu, Barclays

events.name: The Official Google Developer Group for Machine Learning (Meetup #2)
events.description:
**** PLEASE BRING YOUR LAPTOPS ****

#NCLML <- The Twitter hashtag for our goal to make Newcastle the Home of Machine Learning in the UK

**** PLEASE BRING YOUR LAPTOPS ****

This is the official Google Cloud Developer Group, to nurture and educate the local community on topics related to Machine Learning. Our goal is to create a friendly community of experts and like-minded people.

All are welcome, especially:

• Developers or students who want to learn more about ML
• Potential entrepreneurs
• Companies or organizations who would like to use ML in their business
• Careers: potential employers or job-seekers... or if you want INTERNSHIPS

========== NEW MESSAGE! ============

**** PLEASE BRING YOUR LAPTOPS ****

Hi Folks! in this 2nd meetup, we'll start focussing on the Hackathon by LKQ that will happen in Meetup #5 (February 2019)...

... Introducing... "The ML 20 Minute Challenges!".... see below

... So we'll start focusing on some PRACTICAL SKILLS and exercises you can start doing: Yu and Open Lab are going to demonstrate some "20 Minute Challenges", which are practical things that a developer or beginner in ML can do using off-the-shelf tools like Google Tensorflow, to build simple applications or real life tasks

... We're also announcing certain JOBS AVAILABLE (LKQ, Yitu, Caspian)

... And our featured speaker this week is CASPIAN, the fastest growing ML company based in Newcastle

... Will also let you know about the VISA TALK event about the Tier 1 Exceptional Talent visa..... probably happening in November or January at this rate (we have a few other big events happening in November, so trying to fit everything and everyone together)

... We would also like to welcome the pre-accelerator IGNITE taking place right now in TusPark :)

PROGRAMME:

5.15 pm Coffee and Networking
6 pm Welcome (Colin and Becky)
6.05 pm ML Job Vacancies (Becky)
6.15 pm ML Community Announcements: "The 20 minute challenge", the Hackathon in February, the Tier 1 Visa event, Growing the community
6.30 pm Community Intro: Jonny Edwards
6.40 pm CASPIAN: ML and Fintech (Bashar)
7 pm OPEN LABS/Ask An Expert: The 20-Minute Challenge + QnA
7.45 pm Closing words

events.name: The Official Google Developer Group for Machine Learning
events.description:
#NCLML <- The Twitter hashtag for our goal to make Newcastle the Home of Machine Learning in the UK

This is the official Google Cloud Developer Group, to nurture and educate the local community on topics related to Machine Learning. Our goal is to create a friendly community of experts and like-minded people.

==

Speaking at this meetup is Biosignatures, who just closed a £3.5M round with ADV -- their first investment in Newcastle!

5.30 pm - Networking and drinks
6 pm - Opening and Jobs Available
6.10 pm - Keynote and FAQ: Biosignatures (Will Dracup, founder)
6.45 pm - Education: Open Lab's "20 Minute Challenge":

"Yang will give a tutorial on ‘object recognition using convolutional neural networks’, which is an extension of the previous lecture, but tailored for visual recognition. Yang will also give a recognition demo of the trained model using mobile camera"

events.description:

This month we will hear from Jonny from Temporal Computing who will be discussing their chip that uses machine learning.

We will also be hearing from Paul McMurray who will be speaking on the topic of serverless machine learning.

We hope you are all refreshed from summer break!

upcoming.name: GDG Newcastle Dev Fest
upcoming.description:
GDG DevFest is our annual all-day FREE conference that offers speaker sessions across multiple product areas, workshops, demos and more!

All skills and attendees are welcome and we encourage you to come along and spend the day with some industry experts!
Recommend to your friends / family and co workers the more the better.

Speaker information and agenda will be available here when released and finalised. We are in talks with some amazing speakers so we really recommend signing up as soon as possible!

As always if you want to cover a certain topic or area please reach out to us and we will do our best to fit that into the agenda, where possible. Any questions about the day ask away.

With the event covering a full day we will be providing food and refreshments though out.

No requirements needed regarding laptops etc however for workshop sessions if you wish to bring one along feel free.
upcoming.how_to_find_us: We are located between Guitar Guitar and Savers on Grainger street. You will need to ring the buzzer to get into the building then we are on the 1st floor!
